    • Uses of MultiKeyEncryptionScheme in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption that implement MultiKeyEncryptionScheme 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AES128MultiKeyEncryption
      This is a semi-classical double encryption scheme in which we use a PRF (here, we use AES) twice on each value with different keys to double encrypt.
      class  AESFixedKeyMultiKeyEncryption
      This encryption scheme uses AES with a fixed key and thus has the benefit of not needing to repeatedly perform the costly setKey procedure for AES.
      class  HashingMultiKeyEncryption
      We implement this double encryption scheme using Hashing.

    • Uses of MultiKeyEncryptionScheme in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.fastGarbledCircuit

      This constructor should be used in case the garbling is done using a PRG and seed.
